title: Lynessa's Curse
description: A Terra-formed Mars - Plunged back into the dark agesAlastair is a peasant working the lands of Lord Garath. When his beloved, Lynessa, is struck with the dreaded curse, he embarks on a quest to find an artefact from the distant 'time of magic' to save her life. In the jungles of Argyre Planitia, he faces dragons, giant birds and a tribe of warriors who will stop at nothing to protect the ancient artefact from those who would take it.A novella based upon Medieval Mars created by Travis Perry.
author: Adam David Collings
